name: AIR-CONDITIONING, HEATING, AND REFRIGERATION INSTITUTE (AHRI)
description: Trade association for heating, ventilation, air conditioning, refrigeration companies.
sampleDescriptions: Phasing down hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs), including implementation of the American Innovation and Manufacturing Act of 2020 (AIM Act) and ratification of the Kigali Amendment to the Montreal Protocol.
AIM Act HFC phase down; Kigali Amendment ratification
